TopicTitle: ModuleParachuteSetConvectiveStats is flooding the debug log with NREs

Articles.Content:
http://www./download/z0c8hap7can43p6/output_log.txt

So something with the parachutes is causing some large NREs per second, any Ideas on this?

EDIT: Real Chutes seems to fixes this. Use that if you want the problem to workarounded.

Edited September 30, 2015 by TheRag

It happens in the editor (VAB/SPH) - probably because SetConvectiveStats is trying to do something that only makes sense out in the world after FlightGlobals reports ready.

There's an issue for this on the bug tracker: http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/5169

It mentions a work around but I don't know what the work around is. (I just ignore the error when I don't have Realchute installed and it stops being an issue at all if RC is installed)

Alright, I will use RC as workaround. Thanks!

Yep, Exception Detector didn't find anything wrong. Problem Workarounded

Edited September 30, 2015 by TheRag
